snippet: TODOROVICH--Violet. Our beloved Violet on May 20, 2016. Visiting May 24, 10am to 11am, service at 11am, Libby Funeral Home, Beacon, NY. Interment at Sleepy Hollow Cemetery in Tarrytown, NY. 845-831-0179. 1/3
